input.sentences: we had a special family gathering last night near the woods .
uncle [male] tried scaring the kids by putting on a mask and starting a chainsaw . of course it worked ...
it was a perfect night to be out .
i 'm glad mother nature cooperated . such a pretty night . the trees reflecting off the lake so nicely .
we 'll for sure have another night out soon . it 's always a blast to see the family .
output.sentences: The kids had a special night in the woods.
Then the uncle starting scaring everyone.
The trees were reflecting on the water and it was pretty.
The family had a blast that night.
